topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: File Sharing :: Direct Connect

name: Turtle
short_description: Very lite and easy-to-use LAN file sharing software. Using Turtle you can send/receive files in a LAN network to/from any machine which you know the IP address or DNS name. Turtle imitates Blutooth file sharing pattern in mobile phones.
